extension.name: Content - mgThumbnails
extension.author: Moln√°r Gergely
extension.description: This content plugin creates lightbox galleries with the help of following javascript libraries: jQuery, Mootools, Colorbox, Fancybox, Greybox, Shadobox, Slimbox2, Slimbox, Joomla modal (Squeezebox). You just need to insert the fullsize image (what will be shown in the lightbox) and resize it in your content editor. The plugin automatically creates modal links from the resized images, and save the thumbnail pictures too, for faster loading of images.
